00038 #ifndef _PIC24_DELAY_H_
00039 #define _PIC24_DELAY_H_
00040 
00044 #ifndef DEBOUNCE_DLY
00045 #define DEBOUNCE_DLY  15   //in milliseconds
00046 #endif
00047 
00052 #define CYCLES_PER_MS ((uint32)(FCY * 0.001))
00053 
00058 #define CYCLES_PER_US ((uint32)(FCY * 0.000001))
00059 
00060 #include "pic24_util.h"  // Need u32_heartbeatCount
00061 #include <libpic30.h>    // Has __delay32
00062 
00072 inline static void delayAndUpdateHeartbeatCount(uint32 u32_cyc) {
00073   __delay32(u32_cyc);
00074 #if USE_HEARTBEAT
00075   u32_heartbeatCount += (u32_cyc >> 4);
00076 #endif
00077 }
00078 
00079 
00088 #define DELAY_MS(ms)  delayAndUpdateHeartbeatCount(CYCLES_PER_MS * ((uint32) ms));
00089 
00094 #define DELAY_US(us)  delayAndUpdateHeartbeatCount(CYCLES_PER_US * ((uint32) us));
00095 
00096 
00097 #endif
